name: Land Acquisition (Amendment) Act, 2017
tagline: Further to amend the Land Acquisition Act, 1894
content:
REGISTERED No.-M 302  L.-7646 
Mbe ealette of Statham' airczatiega 
EXTRAORDINARY 
PUBLISHED BY AUTHORITY 
ISLAMABAD, WEDNESDAY, JUNE 7, 2017 
PART I 
Acts, Ordinances, President's Orders and Regulations 
NATIONAL ASSEMBLY SECRETARIAT 
Islamabad, the 5th June, 2017 
No. F. 23(12)/2016-Legis.—The following Act of Majlis-e-Shoora 
(Parliament) received the assent of the President on the 2nd June, 2017 is hereby 
published for general information:— 
ACT No. YOUII OF 2017. 
AN 
ACT 
further to amend the Land Acquisition Act, 1894 
WHEREAS it is expedient further to amend the Land Acquisition Act, 1894 
(I of 1894), in its application to such areas in the Federation as are not included in 
any Province for the purposes hereinafter appearing; 
It is hereby enacted as follows:— 
(639) 
Price: Rs. 2.00 
[809(2017)/Ex. Gazi 
640 	 THE GAZETTE OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., JUNE 7,2017 	[PART I 
Short title and commencement.—(1) This Act may be called the• 
Land Acquisition (Amendment) Act, 2017. 
(2) 	It shall come into force at once. 
Amendment of section 4, Act I of 1894.—In the Land Acquisition 
Act, 1894 (I of 1894), in section 4, in sub-section (2), in the proviso, for the MI 
stop, occurring at the end, a colon shall be substituted and thereafter the 
following second proviso shall be inserted, namely:— 
"Provided further that entire process of land acquisition shall be 
completed within a period of one year failing which the notification 
made under sub-section (1) shall stand revoked.". 
JAWAD RAFIQUE MALIK, 
Secretary.
